content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DOMAIN
      operator: longer_than
      value: 2
Core:
  Id: CORE-000180
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when DOMAIN value length is not equal 2.
Outcome:
  Message: Domain value length is not equal 2.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0308
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Each domain dataset is distinguished by a unique,
                  two-character code
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: '2.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Exclude:
      - RELATIONSHIP
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - AP--

json.Description: Raise an error when DOMAIN value length is not equal 2.

Outcome.Message: Domain value length is not equal 2.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Each domain dataset is distinguished by a unique, two-character code
